participant_1.background:
The weather is too hot for me, but I love the sunshine that it brings.
I went to a concert and danced my heart out.
My weight is normal.
I love my fiance and I can't wait to start our life together.
My most valued material possession is my planner.

participant_2.background:
I take advantage of my free time to explore the many places the United States has to offer.
i live in a nice attic apartment in portland or.
i m a pilot for southwest.
my friends tell me that i am a neurotic hypochondriac.
i want to write a book before i die.

content.text: I just found out I might be moving to Portland!
That's awesome! I live in Portland! Where are you moving from?
I'm moving from Florida, I'm excited but I'm also really nervous about leaving my friends and family behind.
That's understandable, moving is hard. But Portland is a great city! There's so much to do here, and the people are really friendly.
I'm looking forward to exploring the city! I'm also excited to start my new job as a pilot for Southwest Airlines.
That's awesome! I'm a pilot too, but I fly for American Airlines.
That's cool! We should go flying together sometime!
Yeah, that would be fun! I'm always looking for people to fly with.
Great! I'll let you know when I get settled in.
So, what do you like to do for fun in Portland?
I like to go hiking, biking, and exploring the city. I also love going to concerts and sporting events.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I'm looking forward to trying all of that out.
You definitely should! Portland is a great city for people who love to be active and have fun.
I'm sure I'm going to love it there
